snippet: John T. Booker Jr., whose Army enlistment was denied after a Facebook post about jihad, is accused of plotting to detonate a car bomb at Fort Riley. A second man was charged with failing to report the scheme.
abstract: Federal authorities announce arrest of John T Booker Jr of Topeka, Kan, on charges of plotting suicide bombing on military base at Fort Riley; Booker, who also goes by name Mohammed Abdullah Hassan, is charged with attempting to use weapon of mass destruction and materially supporting foreign terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: John T. Booker Jr., whose Army enlistment was denied after a Facebook post about jihad, is accused of plotting to detonate a car bomb at Fort Riley. A second man was charged with failing to report the scheme.

headline.main: 2 Kansas Men Charged in Suicide Attack Plot at Fort Riley
headline.print_headline: Kansas Man Is Charged With Plotting to Bomb Base
